titles.title: Holy Trinity, Thanks and Praise to Thee

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Holy Trinity, thanks and praise to Thee, that our life and whole salvation flow from Christ’s blest incarnation and His death for us on the shameful cross.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Had we angels’ tongues, with seraphic songs, bowing hearts and knees before Thee, Triune God, we would adore Thee In the highest strain for the Lamb once slain.
